reviewText:
This DVD titled The Best of Sandi Patty is a wonderful collection of some of Sandi's best performances. This DVD was very well done. There are interviews between Bill Gaither and Sandi between the songs. There are a few rare clips not seen before. You'll be blessed watching this DVD. One minute you'll be laughing and the next you'll be crying.
This is a MUST for any Sandi Patty fan. This will also make a GREAT present for anyone who loves christian music and or loves Sandi's incredible angelic voice.

Scott aka elevatorboy88
Great DVD...Very entertaining...Contents of DVD takes you through some of Sandi's life experiences... Sandi Patty does not disappoint...Wonderful voice...Very pleased with this purchase..
There is no end to what Sandi Patty can sing. Her range of style and vocal ability is beyond compare. Everyone should have the opportunity to hear her amazing voice.

She sings the songs I love to hear.  I don't have 16 more words to say.  This is the last time I will rate any product from Amazon because I am not going to play their game of requiring so many words.
My husband and I love Sandi Patty.  She has been one of our favorites for many years.  A beautiful voice and beautiful person.

Good music from a great singer.  God surely gave her a tremendous voice.
This is a very very enjoyable dvd.

Sandi Patty has forever inspired my life...her music, her books, her LOVE FOR JESUS CHRIST !!  And that is by far the most important aspect of her life...and mine.  The Holy Spirit truly DOES fill my home w/His love, His peace,  HIS TRUTHS !!  And He ALWAYS honors my home when I play Sandi's music, watch her DVDs, read her books.  You cannot go wrong with Sandi Patty!!  ALWAYS BRINGS PEACE TO me & my home.  Attending a Sandi Patty concert is one of the most awesome experiences of life! Do NOT MISS THE OPPORTUNITY !!
Sandi Patty is AN AMAZING SINGER who I have loved for many years. I have all of her CD's and DVD's and have met her several times in person. She truly is "THE VOICE".

I saw this on TV recently and I had to buy it. Sandi blends well with the other Gaither singers and she can really belt out the tunes.

grace2u
We not only used it the Sunday after Easter, but we are passing it around. Everyone in this primetimers class is enjoying hearing about Sandi Patti as well as hearing her sing.
Fantastic singer. 'More than wonderful' this alone would be worth the purchase money. Christian music at it's best.
Wonderful overview of the Gospel music of Sandi Patty. Also time to get acquainted with her. GREAT music.
Bill Gaither did a great DVD on Sandi.  He interviews her, she plays piano, sings several songs and they get serious on certain matters.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
There is no one that can sing any better than Sandi Patty!
an excellent DVD featuring some of Sandi's best performances!  Interviews by Bill Gaither are interspersed between the music - a very worthwhile purchase; highly recommended.
My mom asked for this for Christmas and was very happy to get it!!
